org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks
Interface FileTransferSpec

All Superinterfaces:
FileBrowserTaskSpec, FileTaskSpec, TaskSpec
All Known Subinterfaces:
FileCopySpec, FileMoveSpec
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFileCopySpec, BaseFileMoveSpec, BaseFileTransferSpec
public interface FileTransferSpec
extends FileBrowserTaskSpec

Describes a file transfer task to perform. The file transfer task will transfer the specified set of files to the specified file location.

Method Summary
 FileLocation getDestination()
          Returns the destination (file location) to which the file set should be transfered.
 FileResource getDstResource()
          Returns the destination resource to use for this file task.
 FileSet getFileSet()
          Returns the file set to transfer.
 FileResource getSrcResource()
          Returns the source resource to use for this file task.
 void setDestination(FileLocation destination)
          Sets the destination (file location) to which the file set should be transfered.
 void setDstResource(FileResource fileResource)
          Sets the destination resource to use for this file task.
 void setFileSet(FileSet fileSet)
          Sets the file set to transfer.
 void setSrcResource(FileResource fileResource)
          Sets the source resource to use for this file task.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks.FileBrowserTaskSpec
getFileResource, setFileResource
 
Methods inherited from interface org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.task.TaskSpec
addTaskStatusListener, clearTaskAttributes, getCredentialContext, getDeleteWhenTaskEndsFlag, getDescription, getOid, getTaskAttribute, getTaskAttributes, getTaskAttributeValue, getTaskStatusListeners, getTaskType, getUser, isTaskType, putTaskAttribute, putTaskAttribute, removeTaskAttribute, setCredentialContext, setDeleteWhenTaskEndsFlag, setDescription, setTaskAttributes, setUser
 

Method Detail

getSrcResource

public FileResource getSrcResource()
Returns the source resource to use for this file task. If null, then file task service will find the appropriate resource to use. Note that this method is equivalent to calling getFileResource.

Returns:
The source resource

setSrcResource

public void setSrcResource(FileResource fileResource)
Sets the source resource to use for this file task. Set to null if you wish to let the file task service find the appropriate to use for this file listing. By default it is null. Note that this method is equivalent to calling setFileResource.

Parameters:
fileResource - The source resource

getFileSet

public FileSet getFileSet()
Returns the file set to transfer.

Returns:
The file set

setFileSet

public void setFileSet(FileSet fileSet)
Sets the file set to transfer.

Parameters:
fileSet - The file set

getDstResource

public FileResource getDstResource()
Returns the destination resource to use for this file task. If null, then file task service will find the appropriate resource to use.

Returns:
The destination resource

setDstResource

public void setDstResource(FileResource fileResource)
Sets the destination resource to use for this file task. Set to null if you wish to let the file task service find the appropriate to use for this file listing. By default it is null.

Parameters:
fileResource - The destination resource

getDestination

public FileLocation getDestination()
Returns the destination (file location) to which the file set should be transfered.

Returns:
The destination

setDestination

public void setDestination(FileLocation destination)
Sets the destination (file location) to which the file set should be transfered.

Parameters:
destination - The destination
